Posts.Content: lorineter wrote: does metasasized breast cancer , after its been detected in the lungs,,,does that mean it has to be in the lymph node already....as you can see we are new to this and have alot of questions that my sister doesnt remember to ask....she is definately not a strong person because she has already been suffering for over thiry years with depression and anxiety...i get so mad to thik that she suffered all those years with mental inllness and she has to suffer  even more with this...i told her that maybe some chemo or radiation will zap the depression out of her system....imagine that...but she isnot computer savvy at all....her daughter has one but she wont go up to read anything..i told her about this wonderful site and i read her some of the posts but she doesnt want to hear it..,.so i try to be the information monger....i will say that most of the times she doesnt want to hear it and i make sure i only tell her good news one but still....i wish i can be there to help her but im 1200 miles away...we have family there with her but....ahhhh....they r a wreck themselves....so anyway anytime i think of a question or she asks i will just come here being every one know so much....thankyou all and good luck to everyone on this site!  lorine Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: oh and one more question? lorineter LuAnnH
